thread.title: Piers Morgan accuses Scarlett Moffatt of ending her parents' career
thread.title_full: Piers Morgan accuses Scarlett Moffatt of ending her parents' career

author: Emma Powell
title: Piers Morgan accuses Scarlett Moffatt of ending her parents' career
text:
Piers Morgan accuses Scarlett Moffatt of ending her parents’ career 
The family were dropped from Gogglebox after Moffatt won I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out of Here Tuesday 21 February 2017 14:03 GMT Click to followES Entertainment 'Gutted': Scarlett Moffatt and her family have been dropped from Gogglebox Andrew Benge/Getty 
Piers Morgan has accused Scarlett Moffatt of ending her parents’ career after they were dropped from Gogglebox . 
The family were axed ahead of the new series of the Channel 4 show after Moffatt left following her I’m a Celebrity… Get Me Out of Here win. 
Discussing the news on Good Morning Britain , Morgan said: “It will be a bit tense in the Moffatt household. Young Scarlett becomes a big star through I’m A Celebrity and has now effectively ended her parents’ TV career.” 
Entertainment editor Richard Arnold joked: “I heard she’s bought a mock Tudor mansion in Berks, a sit down mower and her parents are actually sleeping in a car outside, it’s that awkward. National Television Awards 2017
